channel.description: Recent content in Radius on ifconfig.it

item.title: NtRadPing - a free Radius test utility
item.description:
NtRadPing is a free utility to test a Radius server. The usage is simple: insert the IP address of the radius server, the secret, username and password of the user to test. Remember to add the IP of the PC as NAS on the Radius server.
You can download it from the MasterSoft website HERE.
